title: WHITE BEAN SALAD
directions: In a mixing bowl, first combine the tomato, onion, kale, and cucumber. Then add the olive oil (optional), lime juice and salt, and toss together.
Then gently mix the beans into the mixing bowl and serve.
Top with sliced avocado, sprinkle with dried parsley flakes and freshly ground pepper and enjoy!!
ingredients: 1 (15oz) can butter bean (or other white bean), drained and rinsed
1/2 small white onion, peeled and diced
1 haas avocado, halved, cored, peeled and sliced
